title: International Exchange Rate Fluctuations and Overseas Investment Simulation: Mobile-Based Practical Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental macroeconomic theories and exchange rate concepts, ability to calculate simple investment returns
context.additional_context: Optimized for corporate professionals learning on-the-go via mobile devices, structured into five 30-minute modules.

learning_goals: Learners can calculate overseas asset investment returns with 90% accuracy by analyzing exchange rate fluctuation scenarios.
Learners can quantify the impact of exchange rate forecasting skills on investment outcomes through simulated investment exercises.
Learners can establish and evaluate three or more currency risk management strategies through group collaboration.

resources: Real-Time Exchange Rate Data API Integration

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
